Clumpy API¶

This is the full API documentation of the clumpy toolbox.

clumpy.definition: Definition¶

Elements definition

Layer¶

The definition layer of maps

definition.LandUseCoverLayer([name, scale, …])

Defines a Land Use Cover (LUC) layer.

definition.FeatureLayer([name, scale, time, …])

Defines an Explanatory Variable (EV) layer.

definition.DistanceToVFeatureLayer(v, layer_LUC)

Defines a distance to a state as a layer.

Case¶

Case blabla

definition.Case(map_i, dict_vi_vf[, map_f, …])

A land use and cover change model case.

Resampling

Resampling¶

Under Sampling

resampling.under_sampling.compute_sampling_strategy(y)

Compute sampling strategy

resampling.under_sampling.log_scorer_corrected(…)

log scorer
